remarks: Quantifier introduction when one pair of variables is distinct.  Like ~ dveeq2 but connecting ` A. x x = y ` by a disjunction rather than negation and implication makes the theorem stronger in intuitionistic logic.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 1-Feb-2018.)
statement:
dveeq2or $p |- ( A. x x = y \/ F/ x z = y ) $.
$d x z $.
